task.title: Applying configuration changes in Docker
task.shortdesc: Configuration files contain environment variables that can be changed and applied to the Sametime server.

taskbody.context:
You can make configuration changes by modifying the following files.
custom.env
.env
docker-compose.yml
The docker-compose command is used to apply the changes.Values in the Docker commands are case sensitive and must be entered in lower case.

step.cmd: Save changes to the configuration files.
Delete the jitsi-conifg directory with the options recursive and force.

info.p: The jitsi-config directory on Docker is built on start up with the new configuration values.

step.cmd: Save and Restart the server to apply the changes.
